remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时复制操作完成后，将所选的内容转换为全部为指定数据格式、 具有关联的数据对象中存储所有数据格式和是准备将数据对象置于系统剪贴板或开始拖放操作。The event occurs when a copy operation has finished converting the selected content into all specified data formats, has stored all data formats in the associated data object, and is ready to put the data object on the system Clipboard or to begin a drag operation. 使用此事件来检查或复制操作完成后，并继续进行后续操作之前修改的数据对象。Use this event to inspect or modify a data object after a copy operation completes, and before proceeding with subsequent operations. 在整个复制操作可以取消通过调用。The entire copy operation can be canceled by calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此事件来粘贴数据之前，并有可能导致检查数据对象确定备用的一系列操作，如：Use this event to inspect a data object before the data is pasted, and possibly to decide on an alternate course of action, such as: - **取消粘贴**-通过调用取消整个粘贴操作方法。**Cancel the Paste** - Cancel the entire paste operation by calling the method. - **选择备用的格式**-通过指定新的值更改所选的粘贴格式属性。**Select an Alternate Format** - Change the selected paste format by specifying a new value for the property. 新选定的格式必须支持要粘贴的数据对象。The newly selected format must by supported by the data object to be pasted. > [!NOTE] > 如果粘贴格式已更改，请确保粘贴目标支持新指定的格式。If the paste format is changed, ensure that the paste target supports the newly specified format. - **插入新格式**-如果您确定粘贴数据对象不支持所需的格式，则请更新要包含数据的版本中所需的格式的数据对象。**Insert a New Format** - If you determine that the paste data object does not support the desired format, update the data object to include a version of the data in the desired format. 自定义数据转换器通常用作此过程的一部分。Custom data converters are often used as part of this process. 更改粘贴数据对象的内容 () 不会的更改系统剪贴板存储数据; 任何此类更改将仅适用于与关联的粘贴命令关联的数据对象。Changing the content of a paste data object () does not change the data stored on the system Clipboard; any such changes will apply only to the data object associated with the associated paste command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生复制或拖动命令，一次为每个要添加到关联的数据对象的数据格式的一部分。The event occurs as part of a copy or drag command, once for each of the data formats to add to the associated data object. 通常情况下，此事件连接到内容控件，如。Typically, this event is connected to a content control, such as . 此事件的处理程序可用于有选择地防止不需要的数据格式添加到此数据对象，从而消除冗余的数据格式的数据转换处理并提高复制操作的整体性能。A handler for this event can be used to selectively prevent unwanted data formats from being added to the data object, thus eliminating data conversion processing for redundant data formats and improving the overall performance of a copy operation. 若要跳过特定数据格式，请调用方法并指定格式中要跳过属性。To skip a particular data format, call the method and specify the format to skip in the property. 调用此事件的方法不会取消关联的复制或拖动命令。Calling the method for this event does not cancel the associated copy or drag command.
